document.full_text: tpk, a major supplier of touch panels to apple, will pay t$5.6 billion ($194 million) for 19.9 percent of touch panel maker cando in a bid to lift its market share.
document.title: apple supplier tpk to expand touch panel business with cando
lines_and_colors: tpk, a major supplier of touch panels to apple, will pay t$5.6 billion ($194 million) for 19.9 percent of touch panel maker cando in a bid to lift its market share.
